sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 1
sentence.text: ala den wroko disi wi leri fu mi papa.
sentence.gloss: All these (types of) works we learnt from my father.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 2
sentence.text: mi e tan na boiti.
sentence.gloss: I live in the countryside.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 3
sentence.text: a waka esesi go na oso.
sentence.gloss: She walked to the house quickly.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 4
sentence.text: mamanten a komopo na oso.
sentence.gloss: In the morning, he left the house.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 5
sentence.text: mi boro na a busi kon na oso.
sentence.gloss: I (took a short-)cut through the forest to the house.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 6
sentence.text: a buku de na a tafra ondro
sentence.gloss: The book is under the table.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 7
sentence.text: mi teki moni komoto na a dosu ini.
sentence.gloss: I took money from the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 11
sentence.text: a de na wasi-oso
sentence.gloss: She is in the bathroom.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 12
sentence.text: a buku de a tafra tapu
sentence.gloss: The book is on the table.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 16
sentence.text: a buku de ondro a tafra
sentence.gloss: The book is under the table.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 17
sentence.text: den dringi biri kibrikibri baka a oso.
sentence.gloss: They drank beer secretely behind the house.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 18
sentence.text: a e sidon ini a oso.
sentence.gloss: She is sitting in the house.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 19
sentence.text: a sidon fesi a oso.
sentence.gloss: She sat down in front of the house.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 20
sentence.text: a e poti a spun ini a preti.
sentence.gloss: He is putting the the spoon into the plate.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 25
sentence.text: a fringi a tiki naki a skotu.
sentence.gloss: He threw the stick against the wall.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 26
sentence.text: mi seni a buku gi mi mati.
sentence.gloss: I sent the book to my friend.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 35
sentence.text: mi teki a moni na a dosu ini.
sentence.gloss: I took the money from the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 35
sentence.text: mi teki a moni na ini a dosu.
sentence.gloss: I took the money from the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 36
sentence.text: mi teki a moni puru na a dosu ini.
sentence.gloss: I took the money out of the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 36
sentence.text: mi teki a moni puru na a dosu.
sentence.gloss: I took the money out of the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 37
sentence.text: mi teki a moni komoto na ini a dosu
sentence.gloss: I took the money out of the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 37
sentence.text: mi teki a moni komoto na a dosu
sentence.gloss: I took the money out of the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 38
sentence.text: mi teki a moni komopo na ini a dosu
sentence.gloss: I took the money out of the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 38
sentence.text: mi teki a moni komopo na a dosu
sentence.gloss: I took the money out of the box.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 39
sentence.text: fa mi doro na oso, mi sisa lusu kaba.
sentence.gloss: When I arrived at home, my sister had already left.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 40
sentence.text: a liba lomboto den oso.
sentence.gloss: The river flows around the houses.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 41
sentence.text: den skowtu lontu a oso...
sentence.gloss: The police surrounded the house...

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 43
sentence.text: a liba e kon lontu den oso.
sentence.gloss: The river flows around the houses.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 45
sentence.text: a luku lontu.
sentence.gloss: He looked around.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 50
sentence.text: wi o abra wan liba dyonsro.
sentence.gloss: We are soon going to cross a river.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 51
sentence.text: wi o koti wan liba abra dyonsro.
sentence.gloss: We are soon going to (cut a)cross a river.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 56
sentence.text: a opolangi frei abra a foto.
sentence.gloss: The plane flew over the town.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 57
sentence.text: wi o koti wan liba dyonsro.
sentence.gloss: We are soon going to cross/cut across a river.

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 61
sentence.text: op gegeven moment wan hei opo en ede.
sentence.gloss: Suddenly an agouti raised its head

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 70
sentence.text: na fesi fu a skowtu-oso
sentence.gloss: to an area in front/above the police-station

sentence.source: Kofi Yakpo, Adrienne Bruyn. Transatlantic patterns: The relexification of locative constructions in Sranan. 2015. In: Surviving the Middle Passage: The West Africa-Surinam Sprachbund. De Gruyter Mouton. Example: 70
sentence.text: na tapu fu a skowtu-oso
sentence.gloss: to an area in front/above the police-station
